The JSON Web Key Set (JWKS) is a set of keys which contains the public keys used to verify any JSON Web Token (JWT) issued by the authorization server and signed using the RS256 signing algorithm.
See https://auth0.com/docs/tokens/concepts/jwks.

id.description: The id of the alarm stored in the database.

alarmNumber.description: The companys id of the alarm.

deviceId.description: The device which the alarm belongs to.

severity.description:
Determines the severity of the alarm,
1 being the most severe.

status.description: Gets or sets the status of device method invocation.

CloudToDeviceMethodResult.description: Represents the Device Method Invocation Results.

pointId.description: The id of the device variable.

DeviceConnectionState.description:
Specifies the different connection states of a device.
0 - Disconnected
1 - Connected

writable.description: Defines if parameter could be changed.

stepValue.description:
Parameter step value, specifies the allowed stepping between valid values
when the value is numeric.

when the value is numeric.

serialNumber.description: Serial number, and also id, for the product registration.

operatingHours.description: The operating hours for the product registration.

installationDate.description: Determines what date the product was installed.

registrationDate.description: Determines what date the product was registered.

warrantyEndDate.description: Determines what date the warranty expires.

userId.description: The id of the user connected to this product registration.

userAddressId.description: The id of the users address details.

servicePartnerId.description: The id of the Service Partner, if known.

systemAddressId.description: The id of the systems address details.

installerName.description: The name of the installer of the product.

site.description: The site where the product is installed.

modelName.description: The name of the current model.

operatingHours.description: The operating hours for the product registration.

installationDate.description: Determines what date the product was installed.

registrationDate.description: Determines what date the product was registered.

prices.description:
Dictionary with prices. Key is the start date and time in UTC and the value is the price
in (Currency*100)/MWh

hasAlarm.description: Whether system currently has an active alarm.

numVouchers.description: The number of vouchers to create.

serialNumber.description: The serial number of a device.

commandOnly.description:
If true, zone is command-only and no temperature readings
are available. Setpoint will be an unspecified value
(not degrees).

isCelsius.description:
Specified temperature unit in haystack.
If "isCelsius" is false then all temperatures are in Fahrenheit. Otherwies it is in Celsius.

Client Credentials.description:
Default credentials:
client_id: Confidential-Test-Client
client_secret: [provide password]

scopes.WRITESYSTEM: Access to PUT, POST, PATCH, DELETE methods
